message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking $200 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I could come down to $180. It's really a fantastic product and worth every penny.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
